settings.right_content: We’ve all been there. The endless drag of going store-to-store. A pushy sales person sitting you on flimsy couches with eye-watering prices. No one having a good time, including your bank balance.

settings.left_content: We know how important a home that feels like you is. Which is why we want to bring quality furniture at friendly prices into your life, and your lounge. And kitchen. And bedroom. And…well, you get the picture.

settings.banner_subheading: We’re talking couches comfy enough for your 10 episode binge. Bed frames sturdy enough to handle the kids jumping on the bed. Dining sets that look so good even your mother-in-law nods approvingly at it. It’s about furniture that lives with you, and adds life to your home.

settings.benefit_subheading: You can shop for your style at any time with our online showroom, and speak to a real person on our customer service team.
Because we don’t believe in mark-ups or middle men, you get modern, high quality pieces that don’t require a second mortgage to afford.
With high-quality production and strict warehouse quality control, you can shop with peace of mind.
We deliver direct to your door, so you don’t have to move off the couch until your new one arrives.
No two homes or personalities are the same, which is why we offer something for everyone. It’s your space and your vibe, so find your style and own it with our range of designs.

settings.column_left_content: This is why we can have nice things.
settings.column_right_heading: We knew the furniture shopping experience could be better, so we made it happen.

settings.icon_vsubhead: Lifely makes good living easy—in every possible way. Our furniture fits every budget. It can be ordered from the couch and delivered to your door. And you can chat to our friendly customer team 24/7. Good design belongs to everyone

Great service is what makes Lifely special. You can talk to real people, not chat bots, and all the information you need is right there on the website. Measurements, tips, reviews. We’ll even send you shipping updates, so you’re always in the loop

Your home should reflect your personality, and no two homes are the same. That’s why Lifely doesn’t make one particular furniture style. We make great style for every space. Whatever brings your home to life, you’ll find it right here

Style within reach means furniture for everyone. Regardless of the size of your bank account or how many ponies  you have. It means taking the world’s best modern design, and putting it in the hands of everyday people. To let you build your own space. To help you find inspiration and comfort. To make life a bit more...Lifely.

settings.top_heading: We want to create better lives for everyone.
settings.top_subheading: Pull up a seat, a couch, or an ottoman, because there’s room for everyone at our house. We make sure of it.
settings.bl_subheading:
We don’t stop at furniture though. We believe that everyone deserves a safe and decent place to live. Which is why we have:

  • Committed to donate 1% of all profits towards Habitat for Humanity Australia, to support building better lives in vulnerable communities across Australia and the Asia-Pacific region.
  • Donated masks throughout the peak of Covid-19.
  • Partnered with Vinnies to donate our furniture to people affected by the bushfire and floods.

settings.heading: Get to know us
settings.sub_heading: Lifely makes good furniture for every budget. Translation: nice things with a friendly price tag. We believe style shouldn’t be a luxury. It should be for everyone and every space—the big, the cosy and everything in-between. Instead of commissions, we choose quality. Instead of middle men and juicy mark-ups, we deliverfurniture direct to your door. That’s the big secret. It’s how we keep our prices down. Because at the end of the day, we love what we make. And true love has nothing to do with profits.

settings.banner_subheading:
Looking at our prices, you might have noticed that we are significantly more affordable than your traditional furniture
store. So, what kind of witchcraft is that? We cut out the showrooms, the middlemen, the mark-ups and the commissions. All that’s left is good furniture.

settings.block_description: All Lifely products are directly manufactured from warehouse

We cut out the showrooms, the middle men, the mark-ups and the commissions.
All that’s left is good furniture.

We cut out the showrooms, the middle men, the mark-ups and the commissions.
All that’s left is good furniture.

settings.banner_subheading: We believe that everyone deserves a safe and decent place to live. Together with Habitat for Humanity Australia, and the support of our customers and staff, we are helping to rebuild and repair vulnerable communities in Australia and the Asia-Pacific region.

settings.account_subheading: Become a Lifely insider now and enjoy our benefits.

settings.sound_heading: Sound like we might be your style?
settings.sound_content:
Browse, bookmark, ooh and ahh, and shop the furniture designs
that are waiting to come home with you.
